<!-- BEGIN_AUTOGENERATED -->

# Yield Node Formatting

Represents an `yield` keyword

<!-- END_AUTOGENERATED -->

## Formats

Before:

```ruby
yield 1
```

After:

```ruby
yield 1
```

## Formats with a guard

Before:

```ruby
yield unless right_of_way
```

After:

```ruby
yield unless right_of_way
```

## Formats in a ternary

Before:

```ruby
row ? yield : next
```

After:

```ruby
row ? yield : next
```
